result.arabic_text: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَمۡ يَكُ مُغَيِّرٗا نِّعۡمَةً أَنۡعَمَهَا عَلَىٰ قَوۡمٍ حَتَّىٰ يُغَيِّرُواْ مَا بِأَنفُسِهِمۡ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٞ
result.translation: 53.Tama digaala ken kah geytem diggah Yalli sechadah niqmat yeceek woo niqmat keenik kalaah seelaba Rabbi way makko usun luk sugen meqe caalat uma caalatah korossiiy Yallih niqmat engeddi haanam fanah, diggah Yalli ken maxcooca yaabbi ken caaloota yaaxigi kinni.
